steps.name: Given I open Mars Airline home page
When I search flight with "July", "July (two years from now)" and ""
Select item 'July (two years from now)' in 'Returning' dropdown element
select July (two years from now), {force: false}
page load --waiting for new page to load--
Then I should see "Seats available!" message
Validate element 'Search Result Text Message' should contains text: 'Seats available!'

assert expected **[

, 1 more... ]** to contain text **Seats available!**, but the text was **Sorry, there are no more seats available. Back**

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Basic Search Flow, Invalid Return Dates
